Class GameListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • controller.GameListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameListener
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The listener of the game frame.

        private void checkAvailable(javax.swing.JButton b,
                            java.util.ArrayList<?> list,
                            int index)
        Check if the JButton of a card of the board is still available. If valid, change the text, if not hide it.
        Parameters:
        b - the JButton of the frame
        list - the worker/building list of the board
        index - the index of the card
